def process(text):
    # lowercase it
    text = text.lower()
    # remove punctuation
    text = ''.join([t for t in text if t not in string.punctuation])
    # remove stopwords
    text = [t for t in text.split() if t not in stopwords.words('english')]
    # stemming
    st = Stemmer()
    text = [st.stem(t) for t in text]
    # return token list
    return text
